name: Whole Heart
content: And you were hiding on your phone
但是一定有不对的地方
你知道我的不安感如影随形
And I can show my weaknesses
上帝 这一切如此美妙
To see that side of you
All the messy parts every part
所有混乱的部分 每一个部分
So come on baby open up
那就快过来 宝贝 敞开心扉
我发誓你不会感到遗憾
You know I never ever judge
你知道我从不妄下判断
I swear you won't be sorry
我发誓你不会感到遗憾
I want your whole whole heart
I want your whole whole heart
Lay it on me lay it on me on me
把它给我 把它给我
在你的脑海里有些东西
That you can't seem to get around
那些你无法逃避的东西
Tell me all your darkest secrets
告诉我你那些黑暗的秘密
Just me and you just me and you
You doubt I could be your safety net
你怀疑我是否是你的庇护所
Why don't you just love me
为何你不能放手去爱我
And why doubt all all of my intentions
为何质疑我所有的目的
My whole whole heart hey hey hey
So come on baby open up
那就快过来 宝贝 敞开心扉
我发誓你不会感到遗憾
You know I never ever judge
你知道我从不妄下判断
I swear you won't be sorry
我发誓你不会感到遗憾
Whole heart hey give me that
Whole heart lay it on me
You doubt I could be your safety net
你怀疑我是否是你的庇护所
Why don't you just love me
为何你不能放手去爱我
And why doubt all all of my intentions
为何质疑我所有的目的
My whole whole heart whole heart
So come on baby open up
那就快过来 宝贝 敞开心扉
You know I never ever judge
你知道我从不妄下判断
我发誓你不会感到遗憾
So come on baby open up
那就快过来 宝贝 敞开心扉
我发誓你不会感到遗憾
You know I never ever judge
你知道我从不妄下判断
I swear you won't be sorry
我发誓你不会感到遗憾
Whole heart lay it on me
I want your whole whole heart
